# CQCode.CQCardImage method

装逼大图

```csharp
public static CQCode CQCardImage(string imageFile, string source = null, string iconUrl = null, 
    long minWidth = 400, long minHeight = 400, long maxWidth = 400, long maxHeight = 400)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| imageFile | 图片名/绝对路径/URL/base64 |
| source | 来源名称 |
| iconUrl | 来源图标 URL |
| minWidth | 最小 Width |
| minHeight | 最小 Height |
| maxWidth | 最大 Width |
| maxHeight | 最大 Height |
